snippet: The highest court in Massachusetts ruled Friday that breast-feeding mothers must be afforded special accommodations when they take state medical licensing exams.
abstract: Massachusetts Supreme Judicial Court rules that breast-feeding mothers must be afforded special accommodations when they take state medical licensing exams.
lead_paragraph: The highest court in Massachusetts ruled Friday that breast-feeding mothers must be afforded special accommodations when they take state medical licensing exams.

headline.main: Massachusetts: Court Rules for Breast-Feeding Test-Taker
headline.print_headline: Massachusetts: Court Rules For Breast-Feeding Test-Taker
